tool_description: Analyzes heavy metal concentrations using colorimetric methods and portable testing equipment to identify toxic metal contamination in water samples.

sample_id.description: Unique identifier of the water sample being tested

analysis_method.description: Testing method: colorimetric_strips, portable_spectrophotometer, or field_test_kit

sample_preparation.description: Sample prep method: direct, acidified, or filtered

error_messages: Invalid analysis method: Must be one of [colorimetric_strips, portable_spectrophotometer, field_test_kit]
Unsupported metal: One or more metals not testable with selected method
Sample preparation mismatch: Selected prep method not compatible with target metals
Interference detected: Other substances in sample interfering with metal detection
Concentration out of range: Metal concentration exceeds detection range of method
usage: Specify sample ID, target metals, and analysis method. Choose appropriate sample preparation based on expected metal types and concentrations.

metal_concentrations.description: Concentration values for detected metals in mg/L

detected_metals.description: Names of metals detected above detection limits

toxicity_assessment.description: Overall toxicity risk based on metal levels
